p: On the other hand, the proximity of Pompia to lemon proposed by Mignani et al. [ 5], as well as its classification as a lemon cultivar proposed by Camarda et al. [ 1], are only slightly more plausible. Indeed, compared to the published compositions of lemon peel EO, Pompia differed for its α- and β-pinene content: whilst these compounds were only detected in relative abundances lower than 0.5% in the analyzed Pompia peel EO, they are reported as accounting for over 1.5% and 9.0% in Citrus lemon (L.) Osbeck peel EOs, respectively [ 8, 17].
